title: Phase 2: TUI
description:
Bubbletea-based terminal UI for ticker.

Goals:
- Main dashboard view (tasks, output, budget)
- Streaming agent output display
- Progress visualization
- Pause/resume controls
- Interactive epic selection (ticker with no args)
- Keyboard navigation

CLI changes:
- ticker = Interactive TUI mode
- ticker run <epic-id> = TUI mode by default
- ticker run <epic-id> --headless = Current behavior

Exit criteria: Full TUI with dashboard, streaming output, and controls working.
